synopsis.text:
Take a dive into the unexplored waters of Tokyo as Haruka Nanase and Makoto Tachibana acclimatize to their new life in the bustling city. As they gear up for their university's opening ceremony, a twist of fate lands them in the ring of a regional mascot wrestling tournament, representing their beloved Iwatobi. Meanwhile, their fellow swim club members from Iwatobi and Samezuka gather at a local festival, eagerly watching the live broadcast of the tournament.

As the new semester looms, Ikuya Kirishima and Hiyori Toono reflect on their transition from the tranquil countryside to the fast-paced city life. Amidst the hustle and bustle of Tokyo, they cross paths with familiar faces, marking the beginning of a fresh chapter in their lives.

This unaired episode, initially screened at a special Free! event, offers a glimpse into the exciting journey that awaits the characters in 'Free! Dive to the Future.' It is now included in the first Blu-ray/DVD volume of the series, ready to be enjoyed by all Free! enthusiasts.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
